info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 8 at 9:57AM CDT by NWS Aberdeen SD
info.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in South Dakota...
Big Sioux River Near Castlewood affecting Hamlin County.
North Fork Whetstone River near Milbank affecting Grant County.
.For sites with a river forecast, the forecast includes precipitation through the next 24 hours. Any future precipitation could affect the forecasts.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring.
* WHERE...North Fork Whetstone River near Milbank.
* WHEN...Until further notice.
* IMPACTS...At 1056.0 feet, Significant agricultural flooding begins.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 AM CDT Friday the stage was 1056.8 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:15 AM CDT Friday was 1059.1 feet. - Flood stage is 1056.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/abr.
The next statement will be issued by Saturday evening at 600 PM CDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE
